General.Name: Nanjing CEC Environmental Protect
General.Description: CEC Environmental Protection Co.,Ltd provides ecological environmental management services. The company's activities comprise industrial water treatment; urban sewage treatment and water environment treatment; solid and hazardous waste disposal, sludge drying and coupling treatment, and soil remediation; kitchen and food waste co-treatment; flue gas and VOCs treatment; smart environmental protection; intelligent water purification; and ultra-clean flue gas emissions. It also provides system solutions for power, petrochemical, metallurgy, building materials, etc., as well as industrial innovation platform. The company was formerly known as Nanjing CEC Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CEC Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. in April 2015. CEC The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China.
